
                
                <p></p><div class="genxin">89，海底捞捞派虾滑虾10包<br>比店里半价还便宜了，新鲜青虾含量≥90%，海底捞出品包放心的，和店里一个味道的，囤点在家打火锅吃 <br>领10元独家礼金才对 <br><img data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx1.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/00613cSlgy1hzvjhhphxqj30u010awkj.jpg" src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx1.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/00613cSlgy1hzvjhhphxqj30u010awkj.jpg">
